comments.body:
this does not look right...

```sh
c:\test>npm install supports-color
+ supports-color@5.3.0
added 2 packages in 1.144s

c:\test>node
> var x = require("supports-color");
undefined
> x;
{ supportsColor: [Function: getSupportLevel],
  stdout: { level: 3, hasBasic: true, has256: true, has16m: true },
  stderr: { level: 3, hasBasic: true, has256: true, has16m: true } }
> typeof x.supportsColor;
'function'
>
```
I will merge this one then. feel free to send another one for adding the function.
